dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 1348 IH: Preserving Options for Everglades Restoration and National Defense in the Straits of Florida Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gimenez introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To extend the prohibition on the joint use of Homestead Air Reserve Base, Homestead, Florida, by the Air Force and civil aircraft.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preserving Options for Everglades Restoration and National Defense in the Straits of Florida Act.

section.header: Prohibition on joint use of homestead air reserve base with civil aviation
section.text: Section 2874 of the James M. Inhofe National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023 (Public Law 117â€“263) is amended by striking On or before September 30, 2026, the Secretary and inserting The Secretary.
